title: Party A vs Party B (1976)
text:
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA
        
        Case No: CASE_0000
        Year: 1976
        Topic: Taxation
        
        JUDGMENT:
        
        1. This appeal arises from a dispute regarding taxation.
        2. The learned counsel for the appellant relies heavily on the precedent set in AIR 1950 SC 124.
        3. We have carefully considered the arguments. The ratio in AIR 1950 SC 124 is applicable here.
        4. However, we must distinguish the facts. In AIR 1950 SC 124, the court held that...
        5. We therefore dismiss the appeal.
